name: wink
description: Triggers a wink action in the specified eye

name: track
description: Causes the eyes to look off to the specified direction, max x = 35, max y = 25

name: gaze
description: Slower track, max x = 35, max y = 25

name: Dilate
description: Causes the pupils to dilate by a specified amount, min = 0, max = 1

name: jitter
description: Causes eyes to rapidly jitter back and forth a specified number of times

name: scary eyes
description: Causes eyes to roll into the socket and back again

name: shifty eyes
description: Causes eyes to squint and look left and right suspiciously

name: read
description: Alternates slowly looking left and squickly looking right, as if reading

name: sleep
description: Clears the command queue and closes eyes

name: wait
description: Generates a pause before the next command is sent
